plot: Fatima and Abdul are separated during the war in Sierra Leone. They both, unknown to the other, end up in London and after 10 years, when they are each with someone else, fate causes their paths to cross again.
title: Echoes of War
plot_es: Fatima and Abdul are separated during the war in Sierra Leone. They both, unknown to the other, end up in London and after 10 years, when they are each with someone else, fate causes their paths to cross again.
plot_en: Fatima and Abdul are separated during the war in Sierra Leone. They both, unknown to the other, end up in London and after 10 years, when they are each with someone else, fate causes their paths to cross again.
